Level IT supportere til vores kunder i Københavnsområdet. Som Supporter modtager du opkald fra kunder, som primært er medarbejdere i større danske virksomheder. Der er stor fokus på, at problemet løses ved første opkald og supporten foregår primært på engelsk og dansk. Arbejdsopgaver: •Primær support på Windows og Officepakken •Formidle supportrelaterede løsninger •Sikrer høj kundetilfredshed Vi forventer, at du kan: •Samarbejde og være en god og aktiv del af et stærkt team •Levere resultater og imødekomme kundernes forventninger •Følge instruktioner og procedurer •Tilpasse dig og reagere på de forandringer, som er en del af en dynamisk arbejdsplads •Håndtere pres og modgang i de perioder, hvor der er tryk på • Tidligere har arbejdet med ticketsystemer – såsom Remedy, HP Servicemanager eller lign. •Skrive, tale og læse engelsk og dansk på højt niveau Vi tilbyder: •En hverdag i løbende forandring i en afdeling, som følger med tiden, og mulighed for at præge sin egen arbejdsdag. •Gode arbejdsforhold med fokus på det sociale •Gode arbejdsvilkår Arbejdstid: Fuldtid, Mandag – Fredag 8-16 Ansøg: Stillingen skal søges direkte via vores hjemmeside. Vi vil løbende invitere til samtaler. Om Randstad Randstad er en del af den internationale Randstad Group, der er verdens andenstørste udbyder af HR-løsninger. Hver dag formidler Randstad arbejde til mere end 550.000 mennesker i hele verden. Vi har kontorer i 39 lande og er repræsenteret i såvel Europa, Nord- og Sydamerika samt Asien. I Danmark er vi blandt de førende vikar- og rekrutteringsbureauer med 20 afdelinger og inhouse lokationer fordelt over hele landet. En position vi har opnået, fordi vi som eksperter på arbejdsmarkedet formår at matche kvalificerede kandidater med de rette jobmuligheder. ansøg nu kontaktinformation Naja Nastaran Jeloudar email Naja Nastaran Jeloudar investor s relations Euronext: date: see all for kandidater find job opret cv specialistområder karriere360 log på mit Randstad for virksomheder specialistområder vores løsninger kundereferencer arbejdsmarkedet360 om os vores globale historie Randstad i Danmark sponsorater presse kontakt os Randstad Danmark jobsøger virksomhed vores kontorer karriere@randstad søg SP følg os på Randstad er et professionelt valg, når du søger efter vikarbureau eller rekrutteringsbureau for at opnå de mest optimale personaleløsninger til din virksomhed. Kontakt os for hurtig og kvalificeret assistance, hvis du skal bruge vikarer nu eller senere, og når du skal rekruttere til faste stillinger. Vi er et af Danmarks mest kvalitetssikre vikarbureauer og rekrutteringsbureauer. Vi er et autoriseret vikarbureau og medlem af Vikarbureauernes Brancheforening. Title: To datamanagere med SAS-kompetencer
Description: Relevant details not found in the PaidJob-inner section.
HTML_Text: Lignende jobannoncer Job hos Region Midtjylland (166) Job i Storkøbenhavn kategoriseret i Systemudvikling og programmering (234) Jobindex Jobannoncearkiv Dette er en gammel version af jobannoncen, som blev gemt 2016-01-15 07:08:30. Bemærk, at jobannoncen ikke længere er aktuel og firmaet derfor sandsynligvis ikke længere ønsker at modtage ansøgninger. This is an old version of the job ad, which was saved on 2016-01-15 07:08:30. Please note that this job ad has expired and that the company is probably no longer interested in receiving applications. To datamanagere med SAS-kompetencer Ansøgningsfrist: 3. februar 2016 Tiltrædelse: 14. januar 2016 Arbejdssted: Regionshuset  Aarhus Afdeling: DFS - Databasernes Fællessekretariat Arbejdstid: Fuldtid Kontaktperson : Pia Andersen Telefon: 78413988 Del: Facebook Twitter LinkedIn E-mail Udskriv Kompetencecenter for Klinisk Kvalitet og Sundhedsinformatik Vest (KCKS-Vest) har fået flere opgaver og søger derfor en datamanager til en nyoprettet stilling med tiltrædelse 01.03.16 eller snarest derefter. Vi har desuden en datamanager, som skal på barsel og søger derfor også en vikar i perioden 01.04.2016 - 01.02.2017 med mulighed for forlængelse. KCKS-Vest er en del af Regionernes Kliniske Kvalitetsudviklingsprogram (RKKP), som har til opgave at sikre en optimal udnyttelse af det store potentiale for kvalitetsudvikling, der findes i de landsdækkende kliniske kvalitetsdatabaser. I samarbejde med et tilsvarende kompetencecenter i Region Hovedstaden (KCKS-Øst) varetager vi bl.a. drift og it-understøttelse af de kliniske databaser samt den løbende afrapportering til regioner og klinikere. Kompetencecentret er geografisk placeret sammen med Databasernes Fællessekretariat (DFS) i Regionshuset Aarhus. Vi tilbyder en lille enhed med stor mulighed for selv at præge den daglige arbejdstilrettelæggelse gode og erfarne kollegaer, der gerne bidrager med faglig sparring og støtte en god blanding af drifts- og udviklingsopgaver indenfor sundhedsinformatik og klinisk kvalitet på nationalt niveau. mulighed for udvikling af personlige og faglige kompetencer en professionel organisation med en uhøjtidelig omgangstone Som datamanager i KCKS-Vest arbejder du med en bred vifte af datamanagement for kliniske kvalitetsdatabaser. Opgaverne løses i et team bestående af fire datamanagere. Vores daglige arbejdsredskab er SAS 9.3. Arbejdet vil i mindre omfang foregå udenfor Aarhus i form af mødedeltagelse. Dine opgaver I den ny-oprettede, faste stilling vil opgaverne bl.a. være drift og udvikling af organisationens datamodel levering af opgørelser af kvalitetsdata til kliniske afdelinger til regionernes ledelsesinformationssystem planlægning og koordinering af opgaver i datamanagerteamet udviklingsopgaver i forhold til kvalitetsudvikling og sundhedsinformatik, in house og i samarbejde med de andre kompetencecentre systemudvikling, inkl. arbejde med Landspatientregistret/PAS-systemer som datakilder til kvalitetsudvikling at fungere som bindeled mellem henholdsvis kliniske epidemiologer og biostatistikere samt kliniske afdelinger og  administrationer, der skal anvende kvalitetsdata (statistik data) i det daglige arbejde sammenkøring og strukturering af data fra forskellige datakilder samt ansvar for kvalitetskontrol, fejlfinding og rettelse af data I barselsvikariatet vil opgaverne bl.a. være drift og udvikling af organisationens datamodel levering af opgørelser af kvalitetsdata til kliniske afdelinger til regionernes ledelsesinformationssystem at fungere som bindeled mellem henholdsvis kliniske epidemiologer og biostatistikere og kliniske afdelinger og administrationer, der skal anvende kvalitetsdata (statistik data) i det daglige arbejde udviklingsopgaver i forhold til kvalitetsudvikling og sundhedsinformatik, in house og i samarbejde med de andre kompetencecentre udtræk af data til forskningsbrug sammenkøring og strukturering af data fra forskellige datakilder samt ansvar for kvalitetskontrol, fejlfinding og rettelse af data Din profil Du har flair for bearbejdning af data og interesse i sundhedskvalitet. Du kan være ingeniør i sundhedsteknologi, sundhedsinformatiker, datamatiker, programmør eller lignende – det er ikke afgørende, men det er vigtigt at du: er fortrolig med programmering i base SAS har erfaring med at arbejde systematisk med store datamængder og med mangfoldige datakilder har et naturligt drive i selvstændige arbejdsopgaver og er en god teamplayer har gennemslagskraft og et højt engagement er god til at overholde deadlines er serviceminded og god til at kommunikere tværfagligt og tværorganisatorisk Herudover er det en fordel, hvis du har erfaring med arbejdet indenfor sundhedsvæsenet. Hvis du søger den faste stilling, ser vi gerne, at du har erfaring med projektarbejde, herunder planlægning og koordinering Løn- og ansættelsesforhold Stillingerne er på 37 timer pr. uge. Løn- og ansættelsesvilkår er med udgangspunkt i gældende overenskomst med mulighed for forhandling af eventuelle kvalitets- og funktionstillæg. Du kan læse mere om henholdsvis KCKS-Vest, DFS og RKKP på www.KCKS-Vest.dk eller www.rkkp.dk . Hvis du har lyst til at høre mere om stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte datamanager Pia Andersen på telefon 7841 3988 eller kompetencecenterleder Katrine Abildtrup Nielsen på telefon 7841 3980. Ansøgningsfrist Send os din ansøgning, CV og andre relevante dokumenter via vores online system inden kl. 12.00 den 3. februar 2016 . Mærk ansøgningen henholdsvis ”datamanager” og/eller ”barselsvikariat”. Vi afholder ansættelsessamtaler den 10. februar 2016. PS : Vi lægger vægt på P rofessionelt S amarbejde Vi er professionelle i vores samarbejde og lægger vægt på høj faglighed, troværdighed og god kommunikation. Vi er nysgerrige og undersøgende overfor idéer og nye måder, at gøre ting på. Vi ser viden som en væsentlig del af vores ressourcer og stiller den gerne til rådighed. P ersonligt S ammenhold Vi har en uhøjtidelig omgangstone, hvor åbenhed og humor er vigtige nøgleord. Vi vægter gode sociale relationer i et godt og inspirerende arbejdsklima. Vi møder hinanden med nærvær, respekt og gensidig interesse. Vi bakker hinanden op, både fagligt og personligt og har tillid til, at alle gør deres bedste. Da Region Midtjylland er igennem en væsentlig spareplan, vil omplaceringsramte medarbejdere der søger stillingen have fortrinsret til samtale. Send ansøgning Du har allerede ansøgt Du har allerede sendt din ansøgning med denne e-mail. Hvis du vil ændre din ansøgning, så henvend dig til den rette kontaktperson. Luk

Moment - Professional Moment Mobilversion Log ind For virksomheder For kandidater Undersøgelser Kontakt Bright Students Driftsupporter Driftsupporter Uni-tel er en innovativ og fleksibel arbejdsplads, der oplever en kraftig vækst og har brug for en ekstra hånd i deres Backoffice. Den ideelle profil har følgende kvalifikationer: Personlige kvalifikationer: Du har et højt drive og formår at holde mange bolde i luften Du er struktureret, stabil og pligtopfyldende Du er yderst serviceminded, hjælpsom og lyttende – og kan sætte dig i kundens sted Du arbejder proaktivt og selvstændigt Du motiveres af at servicere kunder og dermed bidrage til, at Uni-tel fortsat når deres ambitiøse vækstmål Du befinder dig godt i en omskiftelig hverdag i et højt arbejdstempo Du har et positivt sind og team spirit, da det er en væsentlig forudsætning for, at hverdagen kan fungere optimalt Faglige kvalifikationer: Du er superbruger af MS Office pakken og er vant til at arbejde i CRM systemer Du er perfekt til dansk retskrivning og kan kommunikere mundligt med eksterne kunder på et højt niveau Du har teknisk flair og erfaring som supporter, og har tidligere siddet med internet og tele support Kundskaber i engelsk både mundtligt og skriftligt Dine primære arbejdsopgaver: Telefonisk og skriftligt support af vores hosted pbx produkt One-connect, support af sip-trunk, support på internetleverancer til vores erhvervskunder, samt support på mobil. Udmelding til samarbejdspartnere ved drift varsler Opdatering af produkt og dokumentations manualer Svare på tekniske spørgsmål fra kundeservice Dine muligheder: Et job i en virksomhed, der sætter medarbejdertrivsel højt En særdeles motiverende og udfordrende stilling i et innovativt miljø med masser af udviklingsmuligheder både personligt og fagligt En stilling i en succesfuld virksomhed, der er kendetegnet ved en uformel omgangstone og en dagligdag i tæt kontakt med såvel kunder som kollegaer En udadvendt og alsidig hverdag præget af et højt aktivitetsniveau Tæt samarbejde med et kompetent team En lønpakke, der modsvarer dine kvalifikationer Er du den rette profil? Moment Professionals varetager den indledende proces, og det er derfor vigtigt, at du ansøger jobbet gennem os. Er du interesseret i dette spændende og udfordrende job, så klik på ”Søg dette job” og vedhæft din ansøgning og CV. Da vi løbende behandler ansøgninger, vil vi anbefale dig at søge hurtigst muligt. Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig! Om Uni-tel Uni-tel A/S er blandt Danmarks førende SIP- og mobiloperatører. Uni-tel A/S henvender sig udelukkende til erhvervskunder. Vi samarbejder med et stort netværk af certificerede og kompetente forhandlere over hele Danmark. Uni-tel bidrager til udvikling af partnernes forretning gennem en kompetent og effektiv indsats. Om Moment Professionals Moment Professionals er en rekrutteringsvirksomhed med speciale i leder- og specialiststillinger. 
              Vi rekrutterer kandidater til attraktive virksomheder i hele landet. 
              Moment Professionals er en del af Moment A/S, der også omfatter Moment Students og Moment Staff. Følg Moment Professionals på Søg dette job Tilbage Jobnr. 112393 Opslået 14. januar, 2016 Ansøgningsfrist 2. februar, 2016 Timer 37 t/uge - Fuldtid Ansættelsesforhold Fastansættelse Geografi Sjælland Kategori IT Moment A/S  |  Tlf. 70 20 18 35  | info@moment.dk |  Vester Farimagsgade 15, 1606 København V  |  Møllegade 32, 1. sal, 8000 Aarhus C  | Cookie- og privatlivspolitik

Det er et ufravigeligt krav at konsulenten inden for seneste halve år har arbejdet direkte på en større DW-opgave. Konsulenten skal også selv have erfaring som BI-udvikler - dette behøver blot at være anvendt inden for de seneste 5 år. Viden om Netezza er en klar fordel. Der vil også være projektleder relaterede opgaver. Krav til personen: Det er ikke afgørende at det specifikt er Netezza, PwC og BO konsulenten har erfaring med. Det kan godt være sammenlignelige teknologier. Men hands on erfaring om end den godt må være op til 5 år gammel er ufravigelig. Det er vigtigt at personen er struktureret og erfaring med test/testmanagement er en yderligere fordel. Et fravigeligt krav er at konsulenten har været testmanager på et DW miljø inden for det seneste halve år. Main responsibilities: You will design, develop and test new software solutions. You will provide support to ensure stability and continuity of existing applications. You will be POC for the OutSystems RADP for the entire IT Department. You will deploy state of the art software solutions in cooperation with other Operations Engineers. You will help the existing team to get to the next maturity level with respect to OutSystems technology. You will, in close cooperation with Senior MGT, streamline the end-to-end delivery process. You will optimize the service stability and continuity together with the existing engineers in the department. Required skills: You have a minimum of 5 years of experience with the OutSystems Technology in the role of senior Developer and/or Architect. You have a minimum of 10 years of software engineering experience. You have excellent knowledge of relational databases (e.g. Oracle, MS SQL, and MySQL). You have excellent knowledge of software quality assurance (code review, testing) and test automation (using tools like QTP). You are a team player and your communication skills are excellent. You like to be challenged and are eager to learn. You hold at least a Bachelor degree in IT (or related). Start: A.S.A.P. Varighed: 6 Months (Opt. Ext.) Adecco IT Consulting for kunde Menu Se ledige stillinger Alle stillinger Søg efter stillinger Registrer nyt CV / hent CV Menu Language Dansk English Norsk Bokmål Svenska Tilbage Ikke logget på Se ledige stillinger Annonce Stillingsannonce (Klik på i for at få flere oplysninger) IT-Supporter til vikariat hos international kunde - Adecco IT Consulting for kunde Adecco Danmark Adecco IT Consulting er en enhed i Adecco A/S, der er specialiseret i at levere højtkvalificerede IT-specialister til et meget bredt udsnit af kunder. Adecco A/S er Danmarks førende HR-partner. Adecco tilbyder specialiserede personaleløsninger i form af fleksible vikarløsninger, rekruttering til faste stillinger og  outplacement. Adeccos mål er værdiskabende og unikke løsninger skabt i tæt samarbejde med vore kunder og kandidater. Læs mere om Adecco på: www.adecco.dk Til en af vores store internationale kunder, søger vi en erfaren og serviceminded IT-supporter. Der er tale om et vikariat på 3 måneder med mulighed for forlængelse. Tiltrædelse er mandag den 1. februar. Jobbet: Kunden er beliggende centralt i København, tæt på offentligt transport. Du bliver en del af et onsite support team på 10 personer og skal sammen med teamet yde support til virksomhedens medarbejdere. Dette både over telefon, e-mail samt fysisk rundt i virksomheden. Virksomheden råder desuden også over en servicedesk-telefon, hvor mange 1. level opgaver løses, inden de kommer til onsite teamet. Det er desuden vigtigt, at du trives med hands-on opgaver. Disse kan være alt fra opsætning og nedpakning af nye PC’er på kontorerne eller oprydning på PC lageret. Kvalifikationer og kompetencer: Vi forventer og ser gerne at du: har erfaring fra anden fra større organisation er en erfaren IT-supporter og har arbejdet på mange niveau. Vi forventer at du har gode erfaringer indenfor Microsoft-platforme. at du har bred generel IT erfaring og interesse for teknisk er en dygtig og tålmodig formidler brænder for at levere den bedste service overfor dine kollegaer skriver og taler både dansk og engelsk på højt niveau du er vant til at dokumentere dit eget arbejde du er en udpræget teamplayer, proaktiv og trives i en servicefunktion Du tilbydes: Løn: 150 pr. time + pension Fleksibel arbejdsplads i en særdeles spændende virksomhed Ansøgning Kan du se dig selv i ovenstående og har du lyst til at være tilknyttet Danmarks største formidler af vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger, så registrer en motiveret ansøgning vedhæftet dit personlige CV i Wordformat via linket ”søg stillingen”. Ansøgningerne vil blive behandlet løbende. Har du spørgsmål er du velkommen til at kontakte Carsten Helm-Erichsen på 3838 7005. Søg stillingen Ansøgningsfrist: Snarest Tip en ven Udskriftsversion Nøgleinformation: Annoncør: Adecco Danmark Ref.nr.: 2901349443 Vikar Antal stillinger: 1 Kontaktoplysninger: Carsten Helm-Erichsen 3838 7005 carsten.helm-erichsen@adecco.dk Søgekriterier: Sted DA: Storkøbenhavn Branche IT Fagområde It (Software) It (Hardware) Rolle Medarbejder Support W E | BCRUITER

Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden CPH IT-Servicecenter CPH WEST Besættes pr. 01-03-2016 - Som én ny og samlet skole er vores mål at skabe bedre uddannelse til flere. Vi ønsker at motivere unge til uddannelse og deltagelse på arbejdsmarkedet gennem kvalitet og løfteevne i uddannelserne. Vi vil være en innovativ og digital skole, der uddanner til fremtiden - i et værdiskabende samspil med interessenter og omverden - og vi vil være en skole, der fremmer refleksion og dialog - hos både elever, kursister og medarbejdere. Vi søger CPH IT-Servicecenter søger 2 IT-supportere med tiltrædelse snarest muligt. Hvem er vi? KTS CPH WEST er et stort uddannelsescenter som udbyder erhvervsuddannelser, gymnasiale uddannelser og voksenuddannelser. IT-servicecentret har ansvaret for drift og support af et større netværk med over 150 virtuelle servere og ca. 12.000 brugere. Det er et spændende og dynamisk miljø, der hele tiden udvikler sig, hvilket giver spændende IT-faglige udfordringer. Vi tilbyder Du vil indtræde i Servicedesk-teamet og deltage i det daglige arbejde med at løse diverse ad hoc it-opgaver samt give en god brugersupport. Du vil også, sammen med teamet, deltage i Servicetelefonvagten. Vi forventer IT-fagligt forventer vi, at du - Brugersupport i almindelige kontorapplikationer - Kendskab til AD og brugeradministration - Administration af software og hardware - Fejlsøgning på Pc'er og netværk - Konfiguration og installation af pc, printer og andet perifert udstyr Vi lægger vægt på, at du - har erfaring eller den nødvendige baggrund for at kunne beherske jobbet. - kan arbejde ansvarsbevidst, selvstændigt og struktureret. - er serviceminded og engageret medarbejder. - er teamorienteret. - er udviklingsorienteret og god til at dokumentere. - er uddannet datamatiker eller lignende. - er en god kollega. Løn & ansættelsesforhold Ansættelse sker i henhold til gældende overenskomst mellem Finansministeriet og HK/STAT - herunder også reglerne for Ny Løn. Indplacering sker efter aftale og med mulighed for forhandling af kvalifikationstillæg. Stillingen er normeret til fuld tid (37 timer pr. uge incl. ½ times frokostpause) Vi har flekstid Hør mere Hvis du vil høre mere om stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte IT-chef John Andersen på 33880840. Ansøgningsfrist Stillingen ønskes besat 1. marts 2016 eller snarest. Ansøgningsfrist den 31.01.2016 kl. 12.00. Ansøgning vedhæftet CV, kopi af eksamensbevis samt dokumentation for relevant erhvervserfaring modtages kun elektronisk via vores hjemmeside http://www.cphwest.dk/ - under Ledige stillinger. Alle interesserede uanset personlig baggrund opfordres til at søge stillingen. Københavns Tekniske Skole / CPH WEST Vores skole er landets største erhvervs- og gymnasieskole i Danmark med, eud, htx, stx, hf, hhx og eux, brobygning, 10. klasse og efteruddannelseskurser. Skolen er repræsenteret på 14 adresser i Storkøbenhavn, og ca. 1100 medarbejdere er beskæftiget med at give skolens ca. 8000 årselever en god uddannelse. Description: Relevant details not found in the PaidJob-inner section.

Toggle navigation Toggle navigation Jobsøger Søg job Karrierecenter Mit StepStone CV Rekrutteringsbureauer Virksomhed Hjem Find ny medarbejder Hvorfor StepStone Din kundeside Videncenter Om os Om StepStone Jobsøger Virksomhed Om os Log ind Søg job Karrierecenter Mit StepStone CV Rekrutteringsbureauer Find job Hvad Hvor SØG R&D Software Development Engineer The Dako Pathology Division develops pathology solutions for tissue-based cancer diagnostics. Our portfolio of solutions combines competitive automated systems, software and connectivity, leading reagents and support, all operating in a highly-regulated market environment. We are using lean lab approaches to increase our customer’s productivity and efficiency while simultaneously eliminating the chances of operational errors in their workflows. Software is key to achieving these goals and we are investing significantly in our software team to evolve our current solutions using state of the art technologies and tools. This is an opportunity to join an enthusiastic and dynamic team embarking on a new wave of development effort. We are looking for an enthusiastic, energetic software engineer to join our team designing and developing both platform and products aimed at automating Pathology customer’s workflows. You will engage with a software team that is redefining its products, processes and technologies and consequently this is not only a great personal development opportunity but it is also a unique chance to get involved and help craft the group’s destiny. You will be expected to have a range of software development knowledge including component design and development. You will determine and develop approaches to assignments and solve a range of problems of varying scope and complexity. Strong communication and teamwork with divisional peers in R&D, product marketing, product support, and quality will be key factors for success in the position. Technical knowledge and experience working with the Microsoft C#.Net environment is key to the role and experience with Microsoft tools and the .Net environment is required. Your assignments will start with user requirements, user stories, and existing architectures, to which you will contribute. You will also be responsible for developing tests and test harnesses for your components to ensure they can be both automatically tested and delivered, as defect free as possible, to next level integration testing. Adhering to coding standards, quality procedures, productivity and code quality goals are the primary measures of success in this position. The location for this position is Glostrup, Denmark. About Dako, an Agilent Technologies Company Dako, based in Denmark, is a global leader in tissue-based cancer diagnostics. Hospital and research laboratories worldwide use Dako's reagents, instruments, software and expertise to make precise diagnoses and determine the most effective treatment for cancer patients. Dako, with 1,100 employees, operates in more than 100 countries. Dako became part of Agilent Technologies on June 21, 2012. www.dako.com About Agilent Technologies Agilent Technologies Inc. (NYSE: A) is the world's premier measurement company and a technology leader in chemical analysis, life sciences, diagnostics, electronics and communications. The company's 20,000 employees serve customers in more than 100 countries. Agilent had net revenues of $6.6 billion in fiscal 2011. Søg jobbet her! Who are we and what do we do? Dixa is a Copenhagen based startup software company that has created a unique “customer friendship software” revolutionizing the way online and ecommerce businesses are engaged with their customers. Dixa is a customer service platform that embraces phone, call center, live chat and a friendly “virtual service assistant” brought to life by artificial intelligence. Powered by the seamless combination of human and artificial intelligence, customer service can finally be friendly, proactive, instant and channel neutral. You will join a skilled team of five developers, and you will experience a lot of freedom and responsibilities in your daily work. The Position:   Design and implement new backend features and services   Technologies include Finagle/Thrift, Scala/Java8, REST, Akka, DynamoDB and Docker   Work on scalability and performance challenges   Share your knowledge, document your work   Discuss your progress and problems with a team of skilled co-workers AboutYou:   Curiosity, an open mind and a love for solving problems   Experience coding network services, using HTTP or other transport layers.   A degree in computer science or similar. Don’t be afraid to apply if you’re skilled but lacking a degree, though.   2+ years’ experience with Scala or somewhat functional-style Java   Experience with a non-relational database is not a requirement, but a plus   Experience with Git, Sbt, Maven Repos   Hard working and passionate – we have a lot of cool stuff to do Perks:   Cool headquarter office in Copenhagen   Equity in a fast growing startup (stock options / warrants) Interested? Send both CV and motivational letter in which you tell us why we need exactly YOU on board the rocket. We are looking very much forward to hearing from you. Send CV plus motivational letter to CEO Jacob Vous Petersen jvp@dixa.com. About Dixa Dixa is a “customer friendship software” and we believe that the future of customer service is built by a strong bond between companies and their customers – much like the connection between friends. Dixa is a customer service platform that embraces phone, call center, live chat and a friendly virtual service assistant brought to life by artificial intelligence. Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden C/C++ Software developer - X-ray Image acquisition and processing INNOSPEXION ApS Advanced X-.ray technology for on-line industrial applications. Image analysis, Programming, and software-hardware interfacing (PC-PLC) in connection with development, production, service and troubleshooting of state of the art X-ray technological solutions for industrial applications.   You are expected to have will and abilities to be a part of our software team. In particular, you have a solid background on mathematics, statistics, and physics so that you can undertake the development, analysis and testing of image processing algorithms for a large number of X-ray imaging applications.   You possess skills on developing algorithms, preparing flow diagrams, pseudo-code development and documentation of the various software functions.   You can undertake the C/C++ programming of the algorithms, and merge the resulting functions with libraries and other software parts, including DLL's, active X components, etc.   It is a fundamental requirement that you have a structured way of working, and that algorithms and software is developed to be robust and functional, in accordance with good programming practice, and the wishes and demands from our clients. You are good at reporting to colleagues. You see the value in mutual daily (or more frequent) reporting on the status of the jobs you are involved in, towards your colleagues.   Your area of responsibility is the image analysis modules. This involves the initial methodology screening, the specific development, and the interfacing to colleagues involved in the coding (unless you are undertaking this yourself), the code documentation (if applicable), the overall analysis description, and the testing with the product concerned. In addition, you may be involved in the installation, the on-line tests, and their documentation, with the customer.   You will be involved in the specific programming tasks, and depending on the project, you may be involved in the coordination within a team of other software developers. You will however in particular concentrate your efforts on the imaging, data analysis, test, implementation, software structure and other to the extent the group needs.   You must work relative to the InnospeXion software development platforms and standards regarding documentation of the software, control of the software version, and help maintaining the overview of versions and the functioning of the software.   As you develop abilities and experience, you will become responsible for client specific tasks.   An important part of your work is quickly to develop an expertise level regarding the image acquisition details - i.e. on how to ensure that the primary image acquired at all times is of the best possible quality. This requires knowledge on X-ray imaging, X-ray detector technology, geometrical constraints, calibration, timing, and others. Virksomheden kan se dine personlige data som navn, adresse mm. Derved er du synlig når virksomheden skal rekruttere nye medarbejdere. Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden It-tekniker/IT Supporter IT RELATION A/S Vi søger IT Supportere IT Relation søger IT Superhelte, denne gang til at styrke vores Service Desk 24/7. Er det dig? Du er en smilende IT problemknuser, som brænder for at hjælpe andre og af natur altid yder en høj service. Du er skarp på det tekniske, kan lide at arbejde selvstændigt og er vant til at arbejde med mange bolde i luften. Du motiveres i høj grad af at arbejde med IT og har interesse for at følge udviklingen inden for faget. Din Superhelte profil Du har en uddannelse som datatekniker, IT supporter eller anden relevant baggrund Du er stabil og motiveres af at levere den optimale løsning til kunden Du er positiv og har en god forståelse for din betydningsfulde rolle som IT problemknuser, samt dét at du er medspiller på vedligeholdelse af kunden Du er serviceminded og vindende i din kontakt med kunder Du er teamspiller og her en løsningsorienteret tilgang til opgaverne Du besidder evnen til at kommunikere på alle niveauer og evner at svare 'No Problem' til enhver IT udfordring Du er flydende i skrift og tale på dansk og engelsk, da vi supporterer brugere over hele verden - både på e-mail og i telefonen Du er villig til at indgå i vores 24/7 vagtordning, da vi står til rådighed for brugerne døgnet rundt Bliv en del af IT Superhelte familien Vi tilbyder et spændende og alsidigt job i en ung organisation i vækst, og med høje ambitioner. Vi er en IT-virksomhed lidt ud over det sædvanlige, og det vil du mærke fra du træder ind af døren. Vores IT Superhelte kultur, No Problem-tilgang og KAPOW skinner igennem indretningen, men også hos alle medarbejdere og giver et unikt sammenhold. Du bliver en del af vores kompentente Service Desk team med base i Herning. For os er det vigtigt, at du føler dig tilpas i dit arbejde, og du vil derfor også have stor indflydelse på, hvilke IT-områder du kommmer til at beskæftige dig med. Du får endvidere hos IT Relation gode muligheder for kontinuerligt at uddanne dig inden for de IT-områder, du synes er spændende. Faktisk har vi vores helt eget interne træningslokale, Kapow Academy, som anvendes til at uddanne vores medarbejdere i nye IT-tendenser og teknikker. Har du derfor lyst til at prøve kræfter med et nyt område, tilgodeser vi dine ønsker, da vi tror, at motiverede medarbejdere er bedre IT Superhelte. IT Relation er en social virksomhed, og vi har stor fokus på at styrke sammenholdet i virksomheden. Derfor holder vi ofte diverse firmaarrangementer - både i vores flotte nye lokaler og ude af huset. Det kan være alt lige fra koncerter og sportsarrangementer til grillaftener og julehygge, hvor medarbejdernes familier også er inviterede.Vi er endvidere en virksomhed med fokus på sundhed, hvorfor vi hvert år deltager i bl.a. Fuglsangsø Stafetten og Nordea Løbet. Hver mandag er der desuden mulighed for at spille fodbold med kollegerne i Sportcenter Herning. Vores sundhedspolitik går også igen i den kantineordning, som vi tilbyder ansatte i IT Relation. Vi har knyttet vores egen kok i huset, som hver dag laver varierede, lækre og sunde retter. Herudover tilbyder vi en række øvrige personalegoder, såsom massage, betalt telefon, arbejdstøj samt gunstige pensionsordning og sundhedsforsikring. Du bliver en del af en af de mest succesfulde B2B IT-virksomheder i Danmark. På bare 12 år er vi vokset fra 4 medarbejdere til næsten 100, og vi har høje ambitioner om at forsætte væksten. Vi har hovedkontor i Herning og afdelingskontor i Køge. Læs mere om os på www.itrelation.dk NO PROBLEM Vi er et IT firma lidt ud over det sædvanlige: Smilende, lidenskabelige, servicemindede og i særdeleshed skrappe til IT. Altid tilgængelige. Aldrig lukket. Derfor er vores svar til enhver IT udfordring: 'No Problem'. Hos os fungerer alle medarbejdere som Hverdagens IT Superhelte. Søg jobbet Send din ansøgning og CV til job@itrelation.dk med emneteksten 'IT Supporter'. Søg jobbet - hurtigst muligt, vi afholder samtaler løbende. Virksomheden kan se dine personlige data som navn, adresse mm. Derved er du synlig når virksomheden skal rekruttere nye medarbejdere. Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden Netværkstekniker til større projekt i Koncernservice It Driftscenter, afsnit 3 Koncernservice - IT Infrastruktur søger en dygtig og topengageret netværkstekniker, der vil være med at udvikle organisationen til en moderne, effektiv og kundeorienteret virksomhed. Stillingen er tidsbegrænset til seks måneder med mulighed for forlængelse. Du vil skulle beskæftige dig med teknisk installation, konfiguration, overvågning og support på alt netværksudstyr og dataforbindelser design af lokale netværksløsninger daglig drift af netværk 2.-3. linie support på problemstillinger vedrørende netværk deltagelse i tværgående projekter med infrastrukturopgaver. Hvad forventer vi af dig? Du: har erhvervserfaring med drift og troubleshooting af netværk har relevant it-uddannelse/teoretisk baggrund som datamatiker, datalog, netværksingeniør eller lignende har faglig viden på niveau med Cisco CCNA eller gerne højere niveau (og lyst til at anvende din viden til noget) kan tackle opgaver vedrørende netværk på professionelt niveau, og trives med faglige udfordringer kan arbejde både selvstændigt og i team med engagement, hjælpsomhed og gode samarbejdsevner er struktureret og kan følge en projektplan brænder for at yde god service og med fokus på at gøre en forskel for vores brugere og borgere kan kommunikere med kolleger og administrative brugere er udadvendt og humoristisk, med en struktureret og ansvarlig arbejdsform kan bevare roen/overblikket i stressede situationer besidder gode formuleringsevner på dansk, såvel mundtligt som skriftligt vil indgå i vores vagtordning har kørekort. Hvad tilbyder vi? Du vil blive indplaceret i Infrastruktur, som består af vores Server og Netværksenhed. En fleksibel arbejdsplads, der lægger vægt på teamsamarbejde, initiativ og engagement. En udfordrende arbejdsdag med muligheder for personlig udvikling. Opgaver hvor dine faglige kompetencer/viden kan komme i spil. Du kan slippe dine kræfter og evner løs på et stort professionelt netværk som er baseret på de nyeste teknologier. Gode og dygtige kolleger med åben og uhøjtidelig frisk omgangstone. Gode tværgående samarbejdsrelationer til de andre tekniske enheder i Koncernservice. Mulighed for indflydelse på arbejdsområdet og udvikling af teamarbejdet. Gode værktøjer og et godt arbejdsmiljø. Fuldtidsansættelse og flekstid samt løn efter gældende overenskomst og efter principperne i Ny løn. Yderligere information Yderligere oplysninger kan fås hos kontorchef Brian Holm på 2634 7600. Læs mere om Koncernservice på www.koncernservice.kk.dk . Ansøgning vedlægges CV m.v. Søg stillingen via nedenstående link senest torsdag den 28. januar 2016. Om Koncernservice Koncernservice er et af landets største fællesadministrative centre. Vi betjener Københavns Kommunes syv forvaltninger med styring af økonomi, løn- og personaleadministration og leverancer af it-værktøjer til den daglige drift. Det er vores mål at effektivisere og optimere alle administrative arbejdsgange og sikre et højt serviceniveau, så kommunens 45.000 medarbejdere kan koncentrere sig om at levere velfærdsydelser af høj kvalitet. Vi er ca. 900 ansatte og blandt landets største it-udviklingsarbejdspladser. Læs mere om os på: www.koncernservice.kk.dk . Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden Visitator/netværkstekniker til Koncernservice It Driftscenter, afsnit 3 Koncernservice - IT Infrastruktur søger en dygtig og topengageret netværkstekniker/visitator, der vil være med at udvikle organisationen til en moderne, effektiv og kundeorienteret virksomhed. Du vil skulle beskæftige dig med teknisk installation, konfiguration, overvågning og support på alt netværksudstyr og dataforbindelser klargøring og varetage gennemførelsen af de daglige driftsmøder databehandling og opfølgning på drifts-kpi’er visitation og opfølgning af opgaver i driftscenters visitatorteam deltage aktivt i den daglige drift af infrastrukturen 2.-3. linie brugersupport på problemstillinger vedrørende netværk deltagelse i tværgående projekter med infrastrukturopgaver. Hvad forventer vi af dig? Du: har erhvervserfaring med drift og troubleshooting af netværk har relevant it-uddannelse/teoretisk baggrund som datamatiker, datalog, netværks ingeniør eller lignende har faglig viden på niveau med Cisco CCNA eller gerne højere niveau (og lyst til at anvende din viden til noget) kan tackle opgaver vedrørende netværk på professionelt niveau og trives med faglige udfordring kan arbejde både selvstændigt og i team med engagement, hjælpsomhed og gode samarbejdsevner brænder for at yde god service og med fokus på at gøre en forskel for vores brugere og borgere kan kommunikere med kolleger og brugere er udadvendt og humoristisk, med en struktureret og ansvarlig arbejdsform kan bevare roen/overblikket i stressede situationer besidder gode formuleringsevner på dansk, såvel mundtligt som skriftligt vil indgå i vores vagtordning. Hvad tilbyder vi? Du vil blive indplaceret i Infrastruktur, som består af vores Server og Netværksenhed. Her vil du få ansvar for visitation af drifts- og projektopgaver i en af Danmarks største it-organisationer. En fleksibel arbejdsplads, der lægger vægt på teamsamarbejde, initiativ og engagement. En udfordrende arbejdsdag med muligheder for personlig udvikling. Opgaver hvor dine faglige kompetencer/viden kan komme i spil. Du kan slippe dine kræfter og evner løs på et stort professionelt netværk som er baseret på de nyeste teknologier. Gode og dygtige kolleger med åben og uhøjtidelig frisk omgangstone. Gode tværgående samarbejdsrelationer til de andre tekniske enheder i Koncernservice. Mulighed for indflydelse på arbejdsområdet og udvikling af teamarbejdet. Gode værktøjer og et godt arbejdsmiljø. Fuldtidsansættelse og flekstid samt løn efter gældende overenskomst og efter principperne i Ny løn. Yderligere information Yderligere oplysninger kan fås hos kontorchef Brian Holm på 2634 7600. Læs mere om Koncernservice på www.koncernservice.kk.dk . Søg stillingen via nedenstående link senest torsdag den 28. januar 2016. Om Koncernservice Koncernservice er et af landets største fællesadministrative centre. Vi betjener Københavns Kommunes syv forvaltninger med styring af økonomi, løn- og personaleadministration og leverancer af it-værktøjer til den daglige drift. Det er vores mål at effektivisere og optimere alle administrative arbejdsgange og sikre et højt serviceniveau, så kommunens 45.000 medarbejdere kan koncentrere sig om at levere velfærdsydelser af høj kvalitet. Vi er ca. 900 ansatte og blandt landets største it-udviklingsarbejdspladser. Læs mere om os på: www.koncernservice.kk.dk . Toggle navigation Toggle navigation Jobsøger Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Virksomhed Hjem Find ny medarbejder Hvorfor it-jobbank Din kundeside Videncenter Om os Om it-jobbank Jobsøger Virksomhed Om os Log ind Opret profil Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Find job Søg Frontend udvikler til WEB- og IT-bureau med globale kunder Har du lyst til at nytænke og videreudvikle dybe webløsninger for vores kunder, der primært er internationale virksomheder med repræsentation globalt? Hvem er vi? Vi har udviklet salgs- og marketingportaler i 16 år Vi lægger kunders marketingafdelinger i skyen Fra big data til public omni-channel marketing- og salg globalt Vi er et mindre team bestående af branchens bedste og anderledes frontend- backend udviklere, Omnichannel design, projektledere, kundekonsulent og marketing- og salgsstrategi. Med et stærkt netværk af partnere og freelancere Vi er på fornavn med vores kunder, som har mange forskellige nationaliteter Vi arbejder i en flad ledelsesstruktur, i et dedikeret team, hvor den enkelte er vigtig og vi er super stolte over den forskel vi gør. Udvikling, direkte kundedialog og nye idéer der skaber målbar værdi, er hjørnestenene i vores virksomhed Vi tilbyder: Et nøglejob i en sund virksomhed der har fuld fart på væksten og er helt fremme teknologisk Et åbent og inspirerende team med en flad ledelsesstruktur En hverdag med internationale kunder og globale løsninger Gode muligheder for efteruddannelse, personlig udvikling og ansvar for egen hverdag En løn og pensionsordning der dækker kvalifikationer, erfaring og uddannelsesmæssig baggrund Dine opgaver vil omfatte: Frontend udvikling af nye moduler og koncepter til portalen Udvikling og integration mellem frontend på Umbraco CMS, vores MarketPort DAM og produktkatalog (udviklet i .net, MVC bl.a.). Responsive og multi channel frontend udvikling, der dækker desktop, tablet og mobile Vedligeholdelse og support af bestående moduler Direkte kontakt til freelancere, partnere og kunder i udviklingen og supporten Din profil: Du drives af lyst og engagement til nyt og til at lære nyt, dette vægter vi højt. Ser udfordringer i stedet for problemer. Vil levere høj kvalitet og løsninger, der gør en forskel. Har en relevant uddannelse, uden at du behøver at være ekspert og have årelang erfaring. Har kendskab til nogle og er stærk i andre af nedenstående teknologier. ASP.NET MVC, .NET Framework, AJAX, jQuery, Javascript, Angular, C#. CMS - Umbraco, HTML, HTML5, XML, CSS3 etc. Åben og interesseret i at være på forkant med udviklingen. Glad for at have og tage ansvar og samtidig samarbejde i teamet. Åben over for kontakt til internationale kunder og god til engelsk i skrift og tale. Har det godt i en hverdag med varierende opgaver. Hvis du har lyst til at blive en del af vores team, så send din ansøgning og CV til Bjarne Lindblad på e-mail: info@lindbladcom.dk Lindblad Communication, Tornerosevej 127a, 2730 Herlev, Telefon +45 44 92 60 20 www.lindbladcom.dk Søg jobbet her! Gem job Lindblad Communication Publiceret: 14. januar 2016 Gem job Arbejdssted Tornerosevej 127 a, 2730 Herlev Herlev del jobbet Islands Brygge 57 DK-2300 København S Telefon 70 22 93 00 it-jobbank er Danmarks førende jobportal for it-folk og med en klar vision om at være foretrukken rekrutteringspartner for virksomheder.
Vi hjælper med din jobsøgning og har jobopslag og ledige stillinger inden for alle områder af it: Fx .net, Linux, Sitecore og frontend samt jobtitler som fx programmør, webudvikler, it-supporter, it-projektleder, driftschef og it-chef.

Spørg mig ikke igen Luk Følg virksomheden Head of Software Engineering in Solutions & IT NORDEA BANK DANMARK A/S The Head of Software Engineering is a dynamic and pivotal technology leadership role and the successful candidate will serve as a strategic leader and subject matter expert for software engineering. The Head will provide thought leadership, execution oversight and managing the software engineering team's strategic vision and lead the effort in achieving operational excellence. The position we offer In this role, you will be responsible for securing efficiency in the design, development and implementation processes in software development initiatives. You will be accountable for teams with +200 employees and more than 200 on-shore and off-shore contractors. The candidate will have a proven ability to provide leadership in an onsite / offshore managed services delivery model in a fast paced environment, and secure: -Efficiency and productivity in software engineering teams -Efficient and effective capacity management -High quality competence development for teams and individuals -Effective collaboration with leaders of the software development activities The head of Software Engineering will report to the head of Solutions & IT and be part of the management team. Key Responsibilities: -Recruit, staff, mentor, maintain, grow and lead a best-of-class engineering team. -Support architectural principles in building solutions that will be easy to maintain and enhance over time. -Evolve an agile delivery model that builds on a collaborative, open and rapid interaction between stakeholders and technology execution -Work closely with engineers and architects and develop the best technical design and approach based on the latest technologies and design patterns. Be a hands-on technical leader. -Identify and realise synergies across the development portfolio and development/operations processes -Develop and maintain strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders through open and effective communication. -Effectively communicate complex technology subject matter and potential usage possibilities to senior management, enterprise architecture and engineering teams. -Budget management, planning, forecasting, including headcount. Manage vendor, outsourcer, consultant contracts and service agreements The qualifications you need Successful candidates will have the following attributes: -Strong engineering and technology background with the ability to go deep into technology solutions and a deep technical credibility with engineering organizations, able to recruit top engineers -Flexible, resourceful, figure-it-out-and-get-it-done mentality -Structured, to-the-point, precise and outspoken - argue with data; An excellent listener and proven collaborator with superiors, peers and staff -Consistently attain/exceed individual and team goals, takes smart risks and aggressively lead through change -Ability to manage financial responsibilities associated with the ownership of a large delivery team Qualifications: -Proof of information technology leadership experience; leading and managing technical development teams and experienced in growing high performing engineering teams -Experience with Agile- and Test-Driven Development with distributed development teams including managed services. -Proven ability to successfully work and operate in complex environments, with many stakeholders and a high degree of portfolio complexity; Able to build strong working relationships with stakeholders at all levels including executive managers, partners and vendors, -Strong, proven problem solving skills and ability to identify, analyse and resolve problems, driving solutions through to completion with the ability to exercise mature judgment. -Proven skills in Capacity & Performance Management -Highly creative and innovative with an eye for detail; Curious and forward looking with in-depth understanding of technology trends and with the ability to question and challenge where necessary to change the status quo -Proven ability to understand and tolerate ambiguity, uncertainty and change -Excellent oral and written communication skills are critical, along with the ability to lead teams and individuals. -Fluent in English, oral as well as in writing More information and send application When applying for this position, please ensure to submit relevant CV, motivational letter and other relevant documentation for results achieved. For more information, please contact Michael Hacke, hacke@nordea.com or +45 2275 1296. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Senior Cloud Consultant Red Hat, Inc. - København Denne jobpostering er ikke længere tilgængelig på Red Hat, Inc.. Søg efter lignende job: Senior Cloud Consultant job - Red Hat job At Red Hat, we connect an innovative community of customers, partners, and contributors to deliver an open source stack of trusted, high-performing solutions. We offer cloud, Linux, middleware, storage, and virtualization technologies, together with award-winning global customer support, consulting, and implementation services. Red Hat is a rapidly growing company supporting more than 90% of Fortune 500 companies. Job summary The Red Hat Consulting team is seeking a Senior Cloud Consultant to join us. In this role, you will lead the on-site delivery and implementation of great technology that delivers freedom, flexibility, choice, and superior performance. You'll gain an understanding of our customers' infrastructure and business needs and make recommendations appropriate for their environment. This role is ideal for an infrastructure consultant who wants to build on their core technical expertise and work in a fast-paced environment promoting Red Hat solutions. This role can be located anywhere in the Nordics. Primary job responsibilities Be the subject matter expert at the client site, addressing the technical, developmental, or strategic IT needs Manage problem identification, system architecture definition, software specification and design, testing, and deployment of open source solutions Learn new technologies and apply those concepts to customer needs Adapt to changing customer requirements Respond to incidents, escalations, and exceptions in a professional manner Required skills Experience as a consultant or in a related role; an understanding of the open source community Experience with UNIX or Linux database administration and tuning Background in cloud implementations and an understanding of their business impact Understanding of the software-defined datacenter and related concepts Experience implementing virtualization technologies in an enterprise setting and with enterprise-wide deployments Ability to communicate value, progress, and metrics of key projects to required stakeholders Exceptional analytical, problem solving, project management, and planning skills Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal Experience with related technologies like Ruby and Python Experience working with cloud management solutions and tools ITIL foundation certification Willingness to travel up to 60% Red Hat is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer. We review applications for employment without regard to their race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, age, uniformed services, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, marital status, or any other basis prohibited by law. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Senior Presales Expert / Business Architect Job SAP - København Requisition ID: 100241 Work Area: Presales Expected Travel: 0 - 30% Career Status: Professional Employment Type: Regular Full Time COMPANY DESCRIPTION As market leader in enterprise application software, SAP helps companies of all sizes and industries innovate through simplification. From the back office to the boardroom, warehouse to storefront, on premise to cloud, desktop to mobile device – SAP empowers people and organizations to work together more efficiently and use business insight more effectively to stay ahead of the competition. SAP applications and services enable customers to operate profitably, adapt continuously, and grow sustainably. PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES: The Business Architect leads and manages strategic presales activities for a given set of opportunities and customers and support driving the digital transformation vision and roadmap. The Business Architect (hereafter BA) serves as a confidante to sales team to plan and orchestrate sales engagements and to set the appropriate team of Specialists. A BA is an evangelist for the SAP digital transformation, cloud strategy and solutions in their discussions with customers to influence opinions and inspire action. The BA must have a good working knowledge of SAP solutions, and how they relate to customers’ expectations and requirements. The BA engages with the customers to ideate on new and innovate solutions and works closely with the team to architect solutions that solve our customer´s most complex business problems. The BA must be resourceful and creative and be able to work collaboratively with the SAP virtual account team, partners and customers. The BA must possess strong solution selling and value-based selling skills. EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS: The Senior Presales Expert / Business Architect (BA) will have the following responsibilities: Tasks: Serve as the single point of contact for the Account Executives and specific customers in support of sales opportunities being the key driver from vision to use cases to tangible solution proofs. The BA orchestrate internal and external engagement as a deal captain, drive deal qualification, prioritization and setting the right team in close co-operation with the Account Executive and Presales Manager. BAs will spend time with customers and lead the engagement with key stakeholders by actively participating in customer meetings, events and evangelize business innovation topics in customer industry language and solutions. Facilitate innovation workshops with design thinking techniques and ensuring consistent theme and readiness for workshop/demo delivery. BAs own the quality of the solution specific proposals (presentations, demonstrations, innovation workshops etc.) by driving the process from vision to use cases to tangible solution proofs Co-create the digital transformation vision with key stakeholders at customer and SAP. BAs hold themselves and others accountable to the standards established via Best-Run for delivering memorable customer engagements. Responsible for resource search and reaches out to presales manager for approval and allocation/staffing of the identified resources in the system. Drive deliverables as Business Transformation Roadmaps, Solution feasibility studies and proposals, Business case input, RFx´s, Use case stories to fulfil vision, Solution maps, manage PoC, Mock-ups etc Expectations: Build strong relationship with SAP Sales teams and with their assigned customers Experienced in presenting to and talking with C-level managers and orchestrate to co-operation of cross teams (Business, IT etc) Excellent team management skills and experience with orchestration of complex deals envisioning the big picture and value for the customer Provide best-practice guidance on customer processes and present business values related to solution proposition and roadmap EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES: Personal skills: Self-confident, action and result oriented with a passion for success Master degree required, MBA or equivalent degree required from accredited university preferred Innovative thinking Ability to work in international and virtual teams Excellent communication skills on all levels Fluency in English, any other language an asset. Fluency in one Nordic local language (Danish, Swedish or Norwegian) desirable WORK EXPERIENCE: 8+ years of professional experience including min 5 years of Business Consulting and/or Presales experience in areas appropriate to the job Demonstrate successful engagements Expert knowledge/expertise on the end-to-end SAP processes/solution C-Level messaging and influencing experience Experience in sales and presales processes Digital transformation, Business Consulting and/or Presales experience Leadership experience in virtual and cross- functional teams. Want to have a big impact on the way Nordea Capital Markets operate? Then keep reading. We are building Nordea Capital Markets next generation Middle Office IT solutions: doing reactive data processing to fulfil needs of Liquidity management, accounting, statutory reporting and controlling frameworks. We are looking for a Java Developer to actively contribute to the design, development and rollout of new solutions. This includes working accurately with large amounts of data in a timely manner, sometimes in real-time. You will be part of an informal and strong development team building services and systems using Java and industry standard tools and methodologies. We use agile processes in small teams in close co-operation with our business owners. Skills & Requirements We are looking for a dedicated java developer. To be successful in this role we expect: At least 1 year of experience working with modern Java frameworks and open source tools as well as methodologies At least 3 years of experience in software development Experience in building data processing systems that handles large amounts of data and interfaces with multiple other systems reliably If you don’t already know the Capital Markets domain, we expect you to learn it quickly Fluency in oral and written English is a prerequisite A master’s degree in engineering, computer science or another relevant background You are at home in the core Java framework, Maven, Spring, Databases, SOA, Tomcat/Weblogic, Eclipse/IntelliJ, unit testing, distributed version control, etc. Furthermore, you have a track record of building java server applications of high quality in terms of: maintainability, supportability, correctness, testability, scalability, adaptability, security and performance. You will be working in a team with other Java developers and we expect you to be a great team player while taking individual responsibility for your work. And are you passionate about building infrastructure? Then you might be what we are looking for! THE JOB As a Big Data Engineer, you will be part of a dedicated team of backend developers. The backend team provides the online services and technical infrastructure for all our games. Your role in the team is to develop, test and maintain in-house solutions for collecting big data. You will also be responsible for ensuring that we have access to both recent and old big data, as well as provide intelligent statistics. Your solutions will integrate with our existing and future in-house backend services, and you will thus have close cooperation with our analytics team in order to transform their input into solutions and services that fulfill their needs. YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES Take part in the daily software development process in the backend team, with a primary focus on creating and maintaining a robust architecture around big data Close cooperation with our analytics team to determine the requirements for our big data environment surrounding our games Design and develop the systems and services based on the above requirements and take responsibility for the quality of the services Provide documentation of the services to your fellow developers YOUR PROFILE You have experience with all parts of data warehousing including tools like Hadoop You have experience building data processing systems and setting up efficient ETL workflows You feel at home with .NET, C# backend development and IIS webservers You have experience setting up, tuning and querying both SQL and noSQL databases (MSSQL, MongoDB, DocumentDB, etc.) and in large scale and high performance systems Development and administration experience with business intelligence tools is a plus - experience with Splunk or Tableau is an even bigger plus You are a team player that takes responsibility You are fluent in English, spoken and written WHAT DO WE OFFER? A chance to play a vital role in building our big data architecture An international and unique organizational culture with experienced and passionate colleagues Competitive salary, overtime policy, pensions and health insurance WHERE DO WE GO FROM HERE? Now that you are interested in this position, write us an email - include your resume and a motivated application to jobs@kiloo.com . Looking forward to hearing from you! About Kiloo A/S Kiloo is one of the leading mobile and tablet game companies in the world, founded in 2000. We are constantly pushing the boundaries for technical solutions to create fun and successful mobile games. We have always hired the most talented and creative individuals in the business, putting us ahead of the competition. Kiloo consists of almost 120 dedicated people from many different backgrounds, nationalities and cultures. We are currently looking for a Big Data Engineer, for a newly developed position, for our headquarters in Aarhus apply now Learn more about Kiloo We have great benefits Insurance Pension Private Healthcare 25 days paid holiday Lunch and fruit World Class Coffee Free beer on Fridays Paid overtime Help with Greencard Help with relocation Visit the Kiloo company page return to search results view all Kiloo job listings Your dream job, found on your own terms Want to sit back and be contacted by companies? The position we offer We are Risk IT – a team of engineers responsible for building Nordea’s future risk management systems. Our team is building distributed, scalable and highly resilient risk systems for Nordea Capital Markets. We are now under a massive transformation and redesign towards a service-oriented approach using loosely coupled services, asynchronous communication and resilient design. We have a very challenging and demanding business who actively expand and heavily invest in technology. We are building real-time, heavy loaded systems using cutting edge technology to address ambitious business goals. Our development is based around: Java 8 and in-memory processing (Redis, ActivePivot) Linux environment Microservices architecture which means complex deployments Gradle and Artifactory, we started adopting Docker We need decent deployment capabilities, first class monitoring and a streamlined delivery chain. Skills & Requirements You should be fond of technology, simplicity and innovation. You are a native Linux citizen and you have good scripting (bash, Python). Please note that this job ad has expired and that the company is probably no longer interested in receiving applications. current community chat Stack Overflow Meta Stack Overflow Stack Overflow Careers your communities Sign up or log in to customize your list. more stack exchange communities company blog Stack Exchange Inbox Reputation and Badges sign up log in tour help Tour Start here for a quick overview of the site Help Center Detailed answers to any questions you might have Meta Discuss the workings and policies of this site Stack Overflow Questions Jobs beta Tags Users Badges Ask Question search jobs search companies create cv post a job search results Senior Backend Engineer Falcon Social Copenhagen, Denmark java rest domain-driven-design angularjs refactoring Senior Social Media Job Description Falcon Social is a Software-as-a-Service provider in the Social Media Management space. We provide a unified approach for marketers, customer service specialists and hr personnel of big international brands to manage their social media presence. That means plenty of challenging engineering tasks, complex UIs to simplify and data, loads of data. We are looking for senior members for our engineering team. You are joining an ambitious team of experts who keep pushing the limit in product delivery and experiment furiously while striving for technical excellence. We are agile, organized ourselves into cross-functional, autonomous teams, focusing on one product with a clear mission. We intend to be flat, with everyone equal and with each member's role respected. Day-to-day you will work together with people of different trades: frontend, backend engineers, ui/ux designers, cloud operation engineers, and product owners. We are a maturing startup with an engineering headcount of 20. We are not small anymore, and still growing rapidly. Working at a startup is the most rewarding choice that one can make, but it requires a certain personality as well. That being said, we value open people who take initiative more than lone rockstars. Falcon Social’s frontend is a single page web application built with AngularJs, Bower, Grunt, D3.js on top of a REST flavored HTTP+JSON api served by a lightweight Java8 backend running on DropWizard, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, AWS, Apache Spark and Python. This job requires extensive Java programming language experience and also the knowledge of how modern Java is done. We favor lightweight frameworks like DropWizard, we value a good domain model (DDD), we think in single responsibility (micro)services, we prefer good refactoring skills, pragmatism and craftsmanship. Skills & Requirements AS A SENIOR MEMBER OF THE TEAM, YOU deliver high quality solutions act as a sparring partner to various members of the team constantly share and debate best practices with your peers take initiative know when to speak up, know when is time for crunching perhaps able to lead a group of engineers perhaps enjoy mentoring AS A BACKEND ENGINEER, YOU will define accurate domain models will store data efficiently in a matching storage engine will build highly parallel data processing pipelines will be building fluent apis About Falcon Social WHAT WE CAN OFFER Open and informal work environment with more than 30 different nationalities ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_e2Kd8HuXEU ) High level of responsibility, newest technologies, room for experimentation Working at a central location in Copenhagen (the home of the best craft beer and bicycle lanes in Europe, also the most liveable city on the planet: https://www.google.dk/?gws_rd=cr,ssl&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;ei=jdm7VK_bE4XgywPN_IGADQ#q=the+most+liveable+city+copenhagen ) 5 paid weeks vacation Yearly personal conference budget Healthy lunch and drinks Healthy and not so healthy snacks. We take our candy seriously! Choose your own gear A phone of your choice with subscription and internet for your home Smoke machines in different shape and size. Look what we've built for the Øredev conference at Malmo: https://fogit.falconsocial.com Friday bars Of course, a foosball table apply now Learn more about Falcon Social We have great benefits Falcon Football team Stellar co-workers Central location All the coffee in the world Healthy food and snacks Flexible working hours choose your own gear High level of responsibility and Excellent career possibilities Use the latest technologies Company events and lots of fun social events Visit the Falcon Social company page return to search results view all Falcon Social job listings Your dream job, found on your own terms Want to sit back and be contacted by companies? Please note that this job ad has expired and that the company is probably no longer interested in receiving applications. current community chat Stack Overflow Meta Stack Overflow Stack Overflow Careers your communities Sign up or log in to customize your list. more stack exchange communities company blog Stack Exchange Inbox Reputation and Badges sign up log in tour help Tour Start here for a quick overview of the site Help Center Detailed answers to any questions you might have Meta Discuss the workings and policies of this site Stack Overflow Questions Jobs beta Tags Users Badges Ask Question search jobs search companies create cv post a job search results Senior Developer to Derivatives Systems, Nordea IT Capital Markets Nordea Bank Denmark Copenhagen, Denmark Offers Relocation java spring maven scala python Senior Job Description The Kronos Team in Derivatives Systems is responsible for systems to manage risk and pricing in the Derivatives area. We are a team of fifteen people consisting of Developers and IT Analysts. We work closely with the quant team in Capital Markets to integrate their quant library into the derivatives trading systems and our grid infrastructure. We are looking for a senior developer experienced in the implementation of service based architectures. The position we offer As part of the Kronos team you will: Enable Nordea Markets to satisfy our customers with early and continuous delivery of valuable and high quality software that drives business performance. Design, code, document and test highly effective applications, applying outstanding technical competence to fulfil business and IT requirements, with regards to scalability, functional and non-functional requirements. Manage code quality and flexibility of systems within own area to ensure maintainability and changeability of systems. Keep track of the latest development to learn from best practices in software development constantly ensuring professional development. Team up with business and other IT units to facilitate agile application development processes ensuring effective and efficient deliveries. Share documentation and relevant knowledge with the rest of the team enabling stable operations. Master our development process, culture and code base and then improve it. Skills & Requirements The qualifications you need: As a candidate for the position we expect that you: Enjoy solving complex problems using your strong skills in Java with Spring and Maven / Gradle, but are also comfortable with other object oriented languages. Are fascinated by reactive programming and have probably done some projects in Scala and Python just to keep your craft up to date. Maybe you have also been using Apache Spark. Have worked with message driven applications and are experienced in working with micro-services or other service based architectures. Have worked with relational databases and know SQL, but are also fascinated by, or have even worked with, NoSQL databases. Believe and advocate that Agile best practices such as Scrum are vastly superior when it comes to deliver software efficiently that provide true value to business and you have experience working with Agile methods. Understand the significance of measuring and improving code quality. Maybe you have worked with Semmle or SonarQube. Ideally have experience with implementing and supporting financial software in banking. Thrive on responsibility and enjoy driving the execution of tasks to their completion. Are fluent in English. More information and send application We are looking forward to hear from you. We connect the world of events with speakers, people and media from any industry. We help event organizers build communities, websites and mobile experiences to increase the quality and attendance of their events. Conferize is looking for a senior front-end developer to strengthen our team. The ideal candidate is a pragmatic generalist, has great communication skills and is able to juggle multiple tasks. We would love a fast learner but are right now looking for someone who can hit the ground running. Our stack is currently a healthy mix of Ruby on Rails and AngularJS / CoffeeScript. Required skills: At least 3 years of Javascript professional experience. At least 1 year of AngularJS professional experience. Proficient understanding of CSS. You care about writing semantic well formed code and paying attention to standards and good practices. Proficient understanding of Git. Excellent English communication skills. Bonus skills: Good understanding of SEO principles. MongoDB or similar NoSQL experience. Experience with Ruby on Rails and/or unix Conferize is founded by highly successful serial entrepreneurs and backed by great investors. We’re based in Copenhagen, San Francisco and London. Our core development team is based around Europe working remotely. We accept applications within +/- 1 hour from our main time zone (CET) as our headquarter is in Copenhagen. We’re super ambitious and very nice to be around :-) We will give you everything you need to do your absolute best and most interesting work ever. We offer a competitive salary and a stake in the company to the right candidate. How to apply Sounds interesting? Email Jorge Alvarez with your application and an up-to-date C.V. (a LinkedIn profile will be fine). Application deadline is Thursday January 14th at 12:00 pm CET. If you have a GitHub account (or similar) let us know as well. We expect you to be able to show samples of your previous work. Any questions? Just ask. Skills & Requirements Required skills: At least 3 years of Javascript professional experience. At least 1 year of AngularJS professional experience. Proficient understanding of CSS. You care about writing semantic well formed code and paying attention to standards and good practices. Proficient understanding of Git. Excellent English communication skills. Bonus skills: Good understanding of SEO principles. MongoDB or similar NoSQL experience. Experience with Ruby on Rails and/or unix About Conferize Conferize is founded by highly successful serial entrepreneurs and backed by great investors. We’re based in Copenhagen, San Francisco and London. Our core development team is based around Europe working remotely. We accept applications within +/- 1 hour from our main time zone (CET) as our headquarter is in Copenhagen. We’re super ambitious and very nice to be around :-) We will give you everything you need to do your absolute best and most interesting work ever. We offer a competitive salary and a stake in the company to the right candidate. Joel Test score: 11 out of 12 The Joel Test is a twelve-question measure of the quality of a software team. Do you use source control? Can you make a build in one step? Do you make daily builds? Do you have a bug database? Do you fix bugs before writing new code? Do you have an up-to-date schedule? Do you have a spec? Do programmers have quiet working conditions? Do you use the best tools money can buy? Do you have testers? Do new candidates write code during their interview? We provide a unified approach for marketers, customer service specialists and hr personnel of big international brands to manage their social media presence. That means plenty of challenging engineering tasks, complex UIs to simplify and data, loads of data. We are looking for senior members for our engineering team. You are joining an ambitious team of experts who keep pushing the limit in product delivery and experiment furiously, while striving for technical excellence. We are agile, organized ourselves into cross-functional, autonomous teams, focusing on one product with a clear mission. We intend to be flat, with everyone equal and with each member's role respected. Day-to-day you will work together with people of different trades: frontend, backend engineers, ui/ux designers, cloud operation engineers, and product owners. We are a maturing startup with an engineering headcount of 20. We are not small anymore, and still growing rapidly. Working at a startup is the most rewarding choice what one can make, but it requires a certain personality as well. That being said, we value open people who take initiative more than lone rockstars. Falcon Social’s frontend is a single page web application built with AngularJs, Require.js, Bower, Grunt, D3.js on top of a REST flavored HTTP+JSON api served by a lighthweight Java8 backend running on DropWizzard, PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, AWS, Apache Spark and Python. Extensive experience with a modern MVC Javascript framework (Ember, Angular, Knockout) is a must for this position. Skills & Requirements AS A SENIOR MEMBER OF THE TEAM, YOU deliver high quality solutions act as a sparring partner to various members of the team constantly share and debate best practices with your peers take initiative know when to speak up, know when is time for crunching perhaps able to lead a group of engineers perhaps enjoy mentoring AS A FRONTEND ENGINEER, YOU will be involved in building the rich user interface that hundreds of global client teams work with every day would be responsible for developing high quality UI, using the Falcon Platform's apis will be creating engaging data visualizations and tools for our clients, planning, and structuring great UX across the platform About Falcon Social WHAT WE CAN OFFER Open and informal work environment with more than 30 different nationalities( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_e2Kd8HuXEU ) High level of responsibility, newest technologies, room for experimentation Working at a central location in Copenhagen (the home of the best craft beer and bicycle lanes in Europe, also the most liveable city on the planet: https://www.google.dk/?gws_rd=cr,ssl&amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;ei=jdm7VK_bE4XgywPN_IGADQ#q=the+most+liveable+city+copenhagen ) 5 weeks paid vacation Yearly personal conference budget Healthy lunch and drinks Healthy and not so healthy snacks. We take our candy seriously! Choose your own gear A phone of your choice with subscription and internet for your home Smoke machines in different shape and size. Look what we've built for the Øredev conference at Malmo: https://fogit.falconsocial.com Friday bars Of course, a foosball table apply now Learn more about Falcon Social We have great benefits Falcon Football team Stellar co-workers Central location All the coffee in the world Healthy food and snacks Flexible working hours choose your own gear High level of responsibility and Excellent career possibilities Use the latest technologies Company events and lots of fun social events Visit the Falcon Social company page return to search results view all Falcon Social job listings Your dream job, found on your own terms Want to sit back and be contacted by companies?
