You will become part of a team of 20 skilled colleagues with expertise in a wide range of disciplines within data management and distribution. We are located in Hoje Taastrup, a 20 minutes ride from Denmark’s capital, Copenhagen. The team is split into responsibility groups. The open position belongs to the group whose main tasks are to distribute static data of customers within Nordea Capital Markets. The main responsibilities of the position are: Product development of our main service deliveries towards internal stakeholders Process analysis and development Interpreting and integrating requirements from internal stakeholders, partially based on authority requirements Act as support for internal super-users Since the financial industry is facing a new and exciting future the position will develop according to this. You will therefore continuously develop your expertise and knowledge within this field and get the opportunity to be part of shaping this future and put your own fingerprints on it. Skills & Requirements To become a success in this position, you should possess the following characteristics: Skilled IT Analyst Personal integrity Capable of understanding and dealing with complexity Efficient communicator Thrive with development and change Being an influencer and motivator In best case, you have experience from being an IT Developer, having flair for IT Architecture and have expert IT expertise. If you have questions to this position please feel free to contact Ruben Kirkeby Martinson, Head of Capital Markets IT Distribution Components, e-mail ruben.martinson@nordea.com or phone +45 5547 3266. Title: Senior Java Developer to Market Risk IT, Nordea Capital Markets at Nordea Bank Denmark (Copenhagen, Denmark)
Description: Relevant details not found in the PaidJob-inner section.
HTML_Text:
Lignende jobannoncer Job i Storkøbenhavn kategoriseret i Systemudvikling og programmering (234) Jobindex Jobannoncearkiv Dette er en gammel version af jobannoncen, som blev gemt 2016-01-15 07:13:18. Please note that this job ad has expired and that the company is probably no longer interested in receiving applications. current community chat Stack Overflow Meta Stack Overflow Stack Overflow Careers your communities Sign up or log in to customize your list. more stack exchange communities company blog Stack Exchange Inbox Reputation and Badges sign up log in tour help Tour Start here for a quick overview of the site Help Center Detailed answers to any questions you might have Meta Discuss the workings and policies of this site About Us Learn more about Stack Overflow the company Business Learn more about hiring developers or posting ads with us Stack Overflow Questions Jobs Tags Users Badges Ask Question search jobs search companies create cv post a job search results Senior Java Developer to Market Risk IT, Nordea Capital Markets Nordea Bank Denmark Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark java akka redis gradle spring Offers Relocation Senior Job Description Take part in building the systems which provide Nordea with a foundation to measure and manage its risk. The position we offer We are building systems which are responsible for Risk Management across all of the Nordea Group. Modern risk management imposes a lot of challenges – systems are required to be highly scalable, reactive and capable. Our systems operate with millions of deals and terabytes of data. They use thousands of grid cores and produce billions of records.

We are now under massive transformation and redesign towards a service-oriented approach using loosely coupled services, asynchronous communication and resilient design. We use core java, microservices approach, in-memory grids and other things to achieve maximum performance and scalability.

We work using agile processes in small teams with close relationships to the business. This is a good opportunity for a skilled java developer to participate and contribute to redesign of the whole system, implement your ideas and see them in action. Skills & Requirements You should be fond of technology. We are looking for specialist and for strong programmers. We believe that fundamentals are important - we love Uncle Bob’s papers and SOLID principles, and at the same time we love innovation and really encourage it. We need you to program core java (java 8), have experience in distributed messaging-based solutions, being able to reason about which way of Spring injection is preferred – construction based or property based. In our development we are using: Java 8 including streams and lambdas A little of Scala and Dispatch Akka Redis RESTful services Gradle and Docker We are on our way of transforming old technology into new systems so you should be able to effectively work with legacy code and not afraid of putting your hands inside some PLSQL logic to get understanding how something used to work. More information and send application If you have questions regarding this job please contact Anton Polyakov on +45 3036 5074. Application deadline: 17 December 2015 The Market Risk IT team is a part of Capital Markets IT in Nordea, providing risk management solutions to Risks and Markets. We work close with business but concentrate on IT. apply now more jobs at Nordea Bank Denmark search results Are you looking for a job? When you create a CV, we’ll accelerate your matches and get you in front of employers ASAP. Søg job Jobguide Hjælp Mit Ofir Bliv bruger Jobformidler siden 1978 Log ind Flere job i samme kategori {1} ##LOC[OK]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## ##LOC[Cancel]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## ##LOC[Cancel]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## ##LOC[Cancel]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## ##LOC[Cancel]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## ##LOC[Cancel]## {1} ##LOC[OK]## ##LOC[Cancel]## Servicetekniker med speciale i IP telefoni TELE-POST TELE-POST søger en Servicetekniker med speciale i IP telefoni med tiltrædelse snarest muligt. Din opgave som repræsentant for TELE-POST serviceteamet, er at deltage aktiv i kundeprojekter inden for et bredt udsnit af løsninger, så som IP telefoni,  videokonference, videoovervågning, netværksopgaver o.a i direkte kundekontakt, hvor specialet vil være IP telefoni. Arbejdsopgaver Du får ansvaret for at servicere kunder på udvalgte produktplatforme, og skal medvirke til, at kunderne oplever en god servicering. Arbejdsopgaverne er en blanding af design og udførende opgaver kombineret med lettere dagligdags problemstillinger. Du deltager i projekter hjemme i virksomheden og ude hos kunderne, samt medvirke til levering af nøglefærdige løsninger. Der vil til stillingen forekomme nogle rejseaktiviteter. Faglige kvalifikationer Det forventes, at du har en bred erfaring inden for PBX/PABC Telefoni, samt netværk. Det vil være en fordel (ikke et krav) hvis du har erfaring med Broadsoft telefoni platformen samt SIP protokollen. Der er en fordel (ikke et krav, der vil finde oplæring sted), at du har ”hands on” kendskab på de nævnte områder, og vi forventer, at du har arbejdet med denne type af opgaver tidligere – med succes! Det er en fordel at du har håndvæksmæssigt flair. Forventninger til dine personlige egenskaber Kan planlægge arbejdsindsatsen og realisere planer Kan arbejde selvstændigt, og i team Kan kommunikere klart og tydeligt, såvel mundtligt som skriftligt Er kundefokuseret og serviceorienteret Er gerne (ikke et krav) dobbeltsproget (grønlandsk/dansk) samt har gode engelsk sprogkundskaber Vi tror på, at det er en fordel med et højt energiniveau og vedholdenhed. Der er forventninger og krave til dig, og der er åbne muligheder for en fortsat karriereudvikling i en stor grønlandsk IT virksomhed i fremdrift. Vi arbejder inden for en branche, hvor udviklingen går hurtigt, og hvor kravene til omstillingsevner er store. Vi tilbyder TELE-POST kan tilbyde en udfordrende stilling i et dynamisk miljø blandt kompetente kollegaer, som brænder for opgaverne. Et job med ansvar, indflydelse og varierende arbejdsopgaver i en spændende virksomhed, med god omgangstone og stærke værdier. Du får rig muligheder for både faglig og personlig udvikling, og der tilbydes en attraktiv lønpakke efter kvalifikationer. Såfremt du er interesseret, og passer ovennævnte godt til dine kvalifikationer, glæder vi os allerede til at høre fra dig. Ønsker du yderligere oplysninger, er du velkommen til at kontakte Teknisk koordinator Heri Johansen på telefon: 386533, eller på e-mail: hsj@telepost.gl . Noget for dig? Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Principal Technical Consultant – T24 TEMENOS - København Accepting candidates with T24 technical implementation experience only. Permanent position based in Copenhagen Denmark with intensive travel within and outside of EU. Job Purpose The Principal Technical Consultant is responsible for coordinating and ensuring successful implementation of their technical area of expertise within T24. The Principal Technical Consultant plays the role of interface between the project team and the client, and ensures that all actions are taken to fully satisfy the client in all aspects of a technical nature. The Principal Technical Consultant is also responsible for providing guidance and coaching to less experienced Technical Consultants. Responsibilities and Accountabilities Recognized internally as specialist on complex technical and business matters. Work is performed independently and in collaborative nature. Has completely mastered technical and business skills required to accomplish the job. Provide guidance, coaching and advice to less experienced consultants. Individual with a customer focus who has developed the acumen to cultivate and build lasting customer relations. Specialize in two or more of the following technical areas: Technical architecture and best use of TEMENOS Client services tools, Configuration of TEMENOS products or interfaces with the products, according to the definitions supplied, Data migration and related activities. Provide expertise to clients in the definition of additional standard enhancements and advice on best practices. Lead the identification, definition and coordination of any development activities that may occur during the implementation of TEMENOS products, such as additional specific functionality, interfacing to external systems or conversion programs to be built. Lead the installation of custom enhancements and give final validation on technical set-up and conduct necessary testing to ensure user acceptance and global quality of the solution delivered. Advise the client on the setting up of a production environment and on the running of the TEMENOS products including databases administration. Provide clear and concise technical documentation for internal and external use. Lead all the required technical training for the client, as necessary, which includes customization and design of training materials and handouts that are effective and up to date and run workshops and benchmarks to meet specific project and client needs. Provide regular update and feedback to the Project Manager on implementation success, potential delays and resources needs adjustments in order to achieve project goals. Coordinate with the TEMENOS maintenance groups to ensure that the product problems encountered by the client are understood and resolved Supervise, if and when needed, over specific technical parts of the implementation plan. Perform such other duties, functions and services, consistent with status or vocational ability, as may from time to time be required. Skills and Qualifications Educational & Proficiency level: Professional with a minimum of five years of experience in T24 technical consultancy. Technical knowledge: T24 INFOBASIC, JAVA ORACLE 9 (or above) operating systems, Knowledge and familiarity with the functionality of UNIX, AS400 and NT, particularly disc structures. Exposure to mainframes Other: Analytical, organized, team player, and able to work in a multicultural environment. Job Type: Full-time Required experience: T24: 5 years 2 dage siden - gem job » Ansøg nu Gennemlæs venligst alle ansøgningsinstruktionerne før du ansøger til TEMENOS. » Ansøg nu Gennemlæs venligst alle ansøgningsinstruktionerne før du ansøger til TEMENOS. Søg efter job Arbejdsgivere / Opsæt job Upload dit CV log på Hvad: Hvor: Avanceret jobsøgning Jobtitel, søgeord eller virksomhed by eller område Lead Technical Consultant - T24 Temenos - København As part of Temenos' strategy of high investment and growth in the Nordics region, we will be opening a new office in Copenhagen, Denmark, and are seeking to fill a series of key roles. Responsibilities and Accountabilities The Lead Technical Consultant provides technical support and advice at client sites throughout the lifecycle of TEMENOS product implementation and upgrade projects. The role also extends to offering technical services to live clients to help ensure continued optimised usage and successful operational deployment of TEMENOS products. * Leads the technical and architectural aspects of TEMENOS implementation and upgrade projects, acting as an effective advisor to clients in this area. * Participates in client Technical Design Authority (or equivalent) groups to help ensure TEMENOS products are deployed effectively in the context of the client's IT architecture, and to be an effective advocate of the Temenos technical solution being implemented. * Acts as an effective conduit on behalf of the client and project to the TEMENOS Product organisation. * Provides a single point of contact to clients throughout the project lifecycle for addressing non-functional requirements. * Assists the client through provision of expert advice and guidance for the planning, design and execution of non-functional testing. * Defines technical solutions for customisation and configuration needs for Temenos products. * Identifies technical risks and issues associated with delivery of the implementation or upgrade project, and develops effective mitigation or avoidance measures. * Mentors less experienced technical consultants from TEMENOS, client and partner organisations, promoting adherence to TEMENOS methodologies and quality standards * Maintains an up to date level of personal knowledge on TEMENOS product architecture and is able to transfer knowledge effectively to colleagues, clients and partners. * Delivers specialist technical consultancy to live clients to maintain or improve reliability, stability, performance and ultimately client return on investment in TEMENOS products. Skills and Qualifications * Educational & Proficiency level: Professional with a minimum of eight years of experience in T24 technical consulting. * Technical knowledge: Significant experience is required in application implementation and integration architecture, preferably in a Banking environment. Deep knowledge of Temenos T24. Industry certification and practical experience in technical or enterprise architecture (such as TOGAF) is desirable. * Communication: Strong written and oral communication skills are necessary to achieve unambiguous solution definitions with clients, and to make complex technical solutions simple for management and business stakeholders. Ability to lead technical teams is highly desirable. 1 dag siden - gem job » Vis eller anvend på job Send en e-mail til en ven med dette job Lead Technical Consultant Job i København Job på Temenos i København Gennemse job - Om Indeed - Hjælpecenter Cookies hjælper os med at levere vores tjenester. Toggle navigation Toggle navigation Jobsøger Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Virksomhed Hjem Find ny medarbejder Hvorfor it-jobbank Din kundeside Videncenter Om os Om it-jobbank Jobsøger Virksomhed Om os Log ind Opret profil Søg job Karrierecenter Mit it-jobbank CV Find job Søg Software Developers Configit is a global software vendor, headquartered in Copenhagen. We offer state-of-the-art configuration solutions to companies with product configuration needs. Configit is seeking Software Developers to the Quote team in the Product Division. Configit Quote provides users in large global enterprises with configuration, price calculation, and quotation logic for highly complex products. For our team in Copenhagen we are seeking Software Developers to develop our standard product offerings within the Configit Quote product suite. You will be part of an international environment in a flat organization with development offices in Denmark, UK, and the US. Configit can offer you the opportunity to work with the newest technologies for web and desktop applications in a rapidly growing and successful company. The position will be a part of the Configit Quote team, which develops the standard product offering. Development challenges will include tasks from implementing algorithms to developing architecturally extensible, scalable, and maintainable standard software. In the quote team, you will: Develop standard software products using agile methodologies. Take ownership of features or sub features. Participate in architectural discussions. Learn to understand the business domains related to configuring, pricing, and quoting. Help your colleagues by reviewing their code. Contribute to a continuous improvement of the code base and development methodologies. We expect you to have a strong computer science background with a B.Sc. or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, Software Engineering, or similar, and be able to demonstrate the ability to develop high quality software on the .NET platform with modern web technologies. Desired skills and competences: Strong sense of software product quality. Architectural design skills. Ability to dive into and work on a large codebase. Desire to stay current with technology, best practices and have a willingness to learn. Be self-driven and thrive on working autonomously within a team. Used to working in an agile development environment. We write our code mainly in C# and JavaScript (ES6/ReactJS/Flux). We create RESTful web services via ASP.NET Web API, and we use both relational and document databases. We manage our code using Git/GitHub, and we build it on TeamCity. We value individual responsibility in a collaborative and helpful atmosphere, and we focus intensively on writing quality software. Your typical Configit colleague has a natural interest in programming and started programming before entering university. He or she is passionate about code quality and has developed applications for fun or has contributed to open source projects. About Configit Configit is a Copenhagen based software vendor that offers third generation configuration solutions to companies with product configuration needs. Configit configurators are used for exploring the variance in product development, as sales configurators, and for maintenance, service and overhaul of complex products. Configit’s core technology is based on research in formal verification and constraint solving. All Configit products are based on the patented Virtual Tabulation technology. Configit customers include ABB, Baldor Electric, Greenheck, Case New Holland, Jaguar Land Rover, Grundfos, Netstal, Vestas, Schneider Electric Power Drives, Siemens Electronic Assembly Systems, LEGO, Psion Teklogix, Novenco, Wirsbo, Georg Fisher Piping Systems, Airedale Air Condition Systems, Viking Life, Arla Plast, SCAM Trucks, B&G Fencing, Winnie Paper, Danfoss, Logica, and Waters Inc. You can read much more about Configit at ( www.configit.com ). Do you want to hear and know more about  these open positions at Configit, pls. contact Bettina T. Warming, Theill Warming Rådgivning at +45 20424519 or by e-mail. Theill Warming Rådgivning is handling this recruitment process on behalf of Configit. Please forward your application – including your CV/resumé – via the button below. Søg jobbet her!
